backend/main.mo: Defines data types and lists for books, journals, profiles, progress, and rituals within an actor for the backend canister.
feature_evidence.json: Contains feature evidence metadata mapping feature requests to affected files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Provides short summaries of key frontend files including pages, components, hooks, styles, and config.
frontend/DEPLOYMENT_RUNBOOK.md: Runbook describing prerequisites and steps for redeploying the frontend without code changes.
frontend/DEPLOYMENT_TROUBLESHOOTING.md: Template and checklist for diagnosing deployment failures across build and deploy stages.
frontend/index.css: Base Tailwind layers defining theme variables, dark mode tokens, and global styling rules.
frontend/index.html: HTML entrypoint setting up the root container, favicon, safety shims, and global error handlers.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app configuring routes, theme provider, error boundary, and global toaster.
frontend/src/components/AmbientMusicCaro: Carousel UI for selecting ambient sounds with swipe, mute, and volume control plus dynamic audio playback.
frontend/src/components/AppErrorBoundary: React error boundary that catches errors and displays detailed diagnostics with a reload option.
frontend/src/components/CloudSyncErrorBa: Destructive alert banner for cloud sync errors with retry button and dynamic messaging based on error type.
frontend/src/components/DurationRangeInp: Slider-based component for selecting a duration in minutes with labeled min/max values.
frontend/src/components/FeatureCard.tsx: Empty placeholder file with no implemented component.
frontend/src/components/FloatingNav.tsx: Floating vertical navigation bar with animated icons and hover labels, routing via TanStack router.
frontend/src/components/HamburgerMenu.ts: Mobile slide-out menu with theme toggle, account controls, and navigation using Internet Identity and TanStack router.
frontend/src/components/JournalFiltersDr: Journal filter controls including moods, energy, dates, text search, and favorites using popovers and checkboxes.
frontend/src/components/KnowledgeBookPag: Provides a swipe- and keyboard-navigable pager for multi-page knowledge content with animated transitions and auto-scrolling to content.
frontend/src/components/KnowledgeCategor: Renders a circular carousel of knowledge categories with swipe, keyboard, and center-card selection logic.
frontend/src/components/KnowledgeQuizDia: Implements a quiz dialog that shuffles questions, tracks answers, navigates between them, and displays results.
frontend/src/components/lotus-r3f/LotusM: A Three.js lotus model that animates petals, glow, and growth based on a dynamic LotusGrowthState and theme colors.
frontend/src/components/lotus-r3f/LotusP: A particle system around the lotus that animates chaotic or coherent motion depending on growth state and theme.
frontend/src/components/LotusCanvas.tsx: Draws an animated lotus effect on a canvas with particles and theme-based visibility and pulse behavior.
frontend/src/components/MeditationCarous: Displays a rotating meditation-type carousel with swipe navigation and scaling/visibility based on position.
frontend/src/components/MeditationGuideS: A step-by-step meditation guide UI with swipe gestures, animated transitions, and optional benefits parsing.
frontend/src/components/MeditationTimerR: Canvas-based circular meditation timer with animated wave progress and theme‑adaptive colors.
frontend/src/components/MeditationWaveFi: Canvas component showing a circular liquid fill with animated waves based on progress and theme.
frontend/src/components/MobileBackButton: Mobile-only back button that navigates to the dashboard or triggers an optional callback.
frontend/src/components/PageBackgroundSh: Wrapper providing a full-page background with a LotusCanvas overlay and configurable visual intensity.
frontend/src/components/ProgressBowl.tsx: Canvas-rendered glowing bowl visualization that fills with animated liquid based on total meditation minutes.
frontend/src/components/ProgressLotusR3F: 3D lotus growth visualization using React Three Fiber with lighting, particles, and auto-rotation.
frontend/src/components/ProgressLotusSVG: SVG lotus that animates breathing, glow, and petal openness based on total minutes, streak, and theme.
frontend/src/components/QuizDialog.tsx: A multi-step quiz dialog that collects answers, navigates between questions, and computes a recommended meditation type based on scoring.
frontend/src/components/RitualSelectionM: A modal displaying up to five saved rituals, allowing users to start or delete them, with an empty state message when none exist.
frontend/src/components/SavedRitualsCaro: A swipeable carousel for browsing, starting, and deleting saved rituals, including delete confirmation and gesture navigation.
frontend/src/components/SessionIndicator: A fixed UI indicator showing guest or logged-in status with options to return home or log out, clearing cached queries on logout.
Top navigation providing theme toggle, session indicator, and conditional back buttons for desktop and mobile layouts.
frontend/src/components/ThemedToaster.ts: A wrapper component rendering a configured Toaster for toast notifications.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages an authenticated or anonymous backend actor, refetching dependent queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useCloudOperation.ts: Provides a helper to run cloud write operations with retry logic using the latest actor and identity.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements Internet Identity authentication, exposing identity state, login, logout, and status tracking via context.
frontend/src/hooks/useMeditationTimer.ts: Implements a countdown meditation timer with pause, reset, progress tracking, duration changes, and completion callbacks.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for books, quotes, profiles, journal entries, and guest-mode storage interactions.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines global Tailwind CSS setup, color themes, typography, and various animation utility classes.
frontend/src/lib/bookData.ts: Exports a list of meditation-related book recommendations with extended metadata including Amazon links.
frontend/src/lib/knowledgeContent.ts: Defines interfaces for quiz and technique content and exports a list of meditation technique data with pages and quizzes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and Internet Identity providers.
frontend/src/pages/BookRecommendationsPa: Implements a swipeable book recommendation carousel with theme support and navigation.
frontend/src/pages/DashboardPage.tsx: Renders the main dashboard showing quotes, meditation selection, rituals, and quiz/ritual dialogs.
frontend/src/pages/JournalPage.tsx: Provides a full journal management UI with filtering, editing, favorites, import/export, and cloud sync.
frontend/src/pages/KnowledgePage.tsx: Displays a knowledge library with technique categories, quiz tracking, and deep-link scrolling behavior.
frontend/src/pages/LandingPage.tsx: Landing page handling theme toggling and Internet Identity login, redirecting authenticated users to the dashboard.
frontend/src/pages/PreMeditationPage.tsx: Configures meditation session settings with mood inputs, guides, ambient sounds, and session recording logic.
frontend/src/pages/ProgressPage.tsx: Displays meditation progress stats and supports exporting/importing user data with cloud sync error handling.
frontend/src/pages/ReflectionPage.tsx: Empty page placeholder for future reflection features.
frontend/src/pages/StatsPage.tsx: Empty page placeholder intended for detailed statistics.
frontend/src/utils/ambientSounds.ts: Defines ambient sound metadata and provides lookup helpers by ID.
frontend/src/utils/cloudSync.ts: Defines cloud sync error types and maps backend errors to user‑friendly messages.
frontend/src/utils/cloudSyncRetry.ts: Provides retry logic for cloud operations with readiness and authorization checks.
frontend/src/utils/exportImport.ts: Handles serialization and validation for exporting and importing meditation-related data with safe bigint handling.
Manages storing and retrieving quiz scores in localStorage, supporting guest and authenticated users.
frontend/src/utils/lotusGrowthModel.ts: Computes visual growth state of a lotus model based on total meditation minutes using phase thresholds and smooth transitions.
frontend/src/utils/meditationStorage.ts: Provides guest-only localStorage management for journal entries, progress data, and rituals with legacy migration.
frontend/src/utils/meditationType.ts: Validates and normalizes meditation type strings, defaulting to mindfulness and supporting aliases.
frontend/src/utils/progressRanks.ts: Defines rank tiers based on total meditation minutes and utilities for determining current and next ranks.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility for reading, persisting, and clearing URL parameters using query strings, hash routing, and sessionStorage.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with dark mode, content paths, custom colors, shadows, and extended theme settings using multiple plugins.
project_state.json: Stores project metadata, existing features, and pending feature requests for adjusting meditation UI layout and styling.
